name: 7TropPetit
description:
Game created for the Ludum Dare 38.

This is a game about defending your tiny world from asteroids. Some of them are giving you energie in order to create canons and defend yourself. Try to survive until the arrival of the rescue. (They may never come.)

Use right click to aim with the turrets you can place with left click, they will look at your mouse cursor !

(The game can crash sometimes …)
